message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I'd like to start with a slightly more even split. Let's see if this works for you.
Come on, meet me in the middle
Let's try to be a bit more reasonable this time. I'm willing to take a little less than a 50/50 split.
Getting closer, let's settle on this
I'm getting tired of this back and forth. Let's try to reach a compromise.  I'm willing to move closer to your previous offer.
